activities: Aftermarket is a marketplace to buy and sell domain names. We allow users to upload their domain inventory to solicit and convert offers into sales. We allow users to search, make offers on and purchase domains on our system. In order to list domains for sales and make offers, we require contact information from the parties (email, phone, etc.) We also store information such as addresses, name, etc. This information is also used to verify ownership of the domain. We pass the email addresses over to licensed escrow services on a completed sale to facilitate the escrow process. We use cookies to help users easily navigate the site.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: TRUSTe, a private sector developed dispute resolution mechanisms that incorporate the Safe Harbor Framework
